title.text: Anaphora Models and Reordering for Phrase-Based SMT

abstractContent.text: We describe the Uppsala University systems for WMT14.
We look at the integration of a model for translating pronomi-nal anaphora and a syntactic dependency projection model for English-French.
Furthermore , we investigate post-ordering and tunable POS distortion models for English-German.

introductionContent.text: In this paper we describe the Uppsala University systems for WMT14.
Two of them are based on the documentlevel decoder Docent ().
In our English-French system we extend Docent to handle pronoun anaphora, and in our English-German system we add partof-speech phrase-distortion models to Docent.
For German-English we also have a system based on Moses (.
Again the focus is on word order, this time by using pre-and postreordering.
